name: Square of sum 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Square of sum 1" do
    expected = 1
    actual = squareOfSum 1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Square of sum 5
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Square of sum 5" do
    expected = 225
    actual = squareOfSum 5
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Square of sum 100
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Square of sum 100" do
    expected = 25502500
    actual = squareOfSum 100
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Sum of squares 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Sum of squares 1" do
    expected = 1
    actual = sumOfSquares 1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Sum of squares 5
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Sum of squares 5" do
    expected = 55
    actual = sumOfSquares 5
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Sum of squares 100
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Sum of squares 100" do
    expected = 338350
    actual = sumOfSquares 100

    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Difference of squares 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Difference of squares 1" do
    expected = 0
    actual = difference 1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Difference of squares 5" do
    expected = 170
    actual = difference 5
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: Difference of squares 100
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "Difference of squares 100" do
    expected = 25164150
